title: [Updating League Client] twice during loading screen crash.
body:
_**Good morning fellow Summoners**_,

I was wondering why league forces me to re-update my client for the second time after a sudden crash in loading screen.

http://imgur.com/a/OtYoM

This happened to me twice today, and my team is forced to either wait for me or to remake..
Why is this happening to me during a loading screen crash?

**Am I the only one experiencing this problem?**

replies.body: that happen to me when they game was actualy about to update, now i get error code 003. and i cant play at all

There might be a problem with your update and game files.  I recommend downloading the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and processing a force repatch to make sure your client is in good shape.

My Hextech allways crashing
What i have to do?{{summoner:4}}
